alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lackawanna, northern Luzerne and southern Wyoming Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Evans Falls, or 7 miles southwest of Tunkhannock, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Falls, Dunmore, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains, Old Forge, Pittston and Taylor. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 164 and 185. Interstate 476 between 115 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
